classes.name: MnemonicVisualExplorer
classes.docstring: A class for visualizing the Mnemonic Data Architecture in 3D space.

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize the visual explorer.

Args:
    mda: MnemonicDataArchitecture instance

methods.name: visualize
methods.docstring: Visualize the current state of the mnemonic data architecture.

methods.name: visualize_path
methods.docstring:
Visualize a specific path through the data.

Args:
    path_id: ID of the path to visualize

methods.name: interactive_explorer
methods.docstring:
Launch an interactive explorer for the Mnemonic Data Architecture.
This provides a more interactive experience with the ability to
select nodes, view details, and navigate paths.

functions.name: main
functions.docstring: Main function to demonstrate the visual explorer.

functions.name: visualize
functions.docstring: Visualize the current state of the mnemonic data architecture.

functions.name: visualize_path
functions.docstring:
Visualize a specific path through the data.

Args:
    path_id: ID of the path to visualize

functions.name: interactive_explorer
functions.docstring:
Launch an interactive explorer for the Mnemonic Data Architecture.
This provides a more interactive experience with the ability to
select nodes, view details, and navigate paths.
